MAIN.SIGNAL_R_FAILURE_MESSAGE: The connection with the notification server was lost, therefore the Portal is not receiving real-time panic button alerts
MAIN.ACCESS_FORBIDDEN: You do not have authorization to access Global Access Portal. Please, request your access at IAM portal.

MAP.SHOW_PERIMETERS_TOOLTIP: Display the Vale perimeters filtered by the selected site
MAP.SHOW_FENCES_TOOLTIP: Display the Vale fences filtered by the selected site

SETTINGS_OVERLAY.TITLE: Notifications Settings
SETTINGS_OVERLAY.PROVIDE_NUMBER_WITH_AREA_CODE: Provide a cel phone number with an area code
SETTINGS_OVERLAY.PROVIDED_NUMBER_INVALID: Invalid number! Please provide a phone number with a valid area code - format (99) 9999-9999
SETTINGS_OVERLAY.SAVE_TOAST_FAILURE: Save settings failed, please contact the system support

GEOFENCES.INSERT_POINT_OUTSIDE_PERIMETER: It's not allowed to create virtual fences outside of an official Vale perimeter.

MSAL.MISSING_REQUIRED_ROLES: You do not have access as the expected role is not found. Please ensure that your account is assigned to an app role and then sign-out and sign-in again.
MSAL.MISSING_TOKEN_CLAIMS: Token does not have roles claim. Please ensure that your account is assigned to an app role and then sign-out and sign-in again.

MESSAGES.SAVE_ERROR: Something went wrong while recording data
MESSAGES.REMOVE_ERROR: Something went wrong while removing data

REAL_TIME_EVENTS_SELECTOR.REAL_TIME_BUTTON_DISCLAIMER: Real time events are limited to connectivity of each device.

DISPLACEMENTS.TRIP_SEARCH_TOOLTIP: The search contains trips with route information that serve the selected site or that ended on that site.
DISPLACEMENTS.PLATE_SEARCH_TOOLTIP: The search will be carried out in the last 90 days on all trips made in Brazil.

DASHBOARD.HISTORIC_DATA_EVENTS_DISCLAIMER: Located on site within the last 12 hours
DASHBOARD.HISTORIC_DATA_EVENTS_DISCLAIMER_REAL_TIM: Located on site in real time
DASHBOARD.HISTORIC_DATA_EVENTS_DISCLAIMER_DEVICE_G: Located on site within the last 12 hours, depending on the devices in your device group
DASHBOARD.HISTORIC_DATA_EVENTS_DISCLAIMER_REAL_TIM: Located on site in real time, depending on the devices in your device group
DASHBOARD.INTERVAL_DISCLAIMER: The data is automatically updated every 2 minutes.

LIST.NAME: Name
LIST.INTERVAL_DISCLAIMER: The data is automatically updated every 2 minutes.

HISTORIC.APPLY_SHOW_DEVICES_NOT_REPORTING_RULE_PE: Inform the period in minutes for being considered to send alerts
HISTORIC.APPLY_SHOW_DEVICES_NOT_REPORTING_RULE: Enable device alert without recent location
HISTORIC.APPLY_SHOW_DEVICES_NOT_REPORTING_RULE_TO: Display alerts on devices when it stop to report position in a time. This enables the auto refresh of data every 2 minutes
HISTORIC.APPLY_SHOW_DEVICES_NOT_REPORTING_RULE_DI: It is not possible to enable the alerts and devices updates, if there is not a person selected
HISTORIC.DEVICE_IS_NOT_REPORTING: The device is not reporting new positions for a long time
HISTORIC.CHOOSE_A_SITE_WITH_VIRTUAL_FENCES: Choose a site with available fences to enable this checkbox
HISTORIC.CHOOSE_A_SITE_WITH_POI: Choose a site with available points of interests to enable this checkbox
HISTORIC.TRACKING_NOT_FOUND: We couldn't find any tracking route for this person
HISTORIC.NOT_FOUND: No one has been found with the applied filters
HISTORIC.NO_LOCATION_REPORTED: There are no reported locations for this person within the specified period.
HISTORIC.NAME: Name
HISTORIC.EXPORT_DONE_MESSAGE: You will receive an e-mail containing the requested information.
HISTORIC.CONFIDENTIAL_DATA: These data are protected and confidential
HISTORIC.AFTER_EXPORT_PROCESS: Once processed, your export will be automatically sent to the recipient below.
HISTORIC.REAL_TIME_DISCLAIMER: Real time limited to event sending taking into account the connectivity of each device.
HISTORIC.INFO_REAL_TIME_SEARCH: Displays the people currently located within the area, so people's exit locations will not be displayed, considering all events received in the last 12 hours.
HISTORIC.INFO_30MIM_SEARCH: Displays people located in the last 30 minutes, even with an exit location
HISTORIC.INFO_2H_SEARCH: Displays people located in the last 2 hours, even with an exit location
HISTORIC.INFO_2H_PLUS_SEARCH: Allows search for a person's locations over the last 3 months

DISPLACEMENT.BADGE_IAM_ID_LINE: Badge Id, IAM Id or line
DISPLACEMENT.EXPORT_DISCLAIMER: This list contains information about trips that attend to the selected site. End of trip information only available from 22/Oct/24
DISPLACEMENT.NAME: Name
DISPLACEMENT.CONFIDENTIAL_DATA: These data are protected and confidential
DISPLACEMENT.AFTER_EXPORT_PROCESS: Once processed, your export will be automatically sent to the recipient below.
DISPLACEMENT.EXPORT_DONE_MESSAGE: You will receive an e-mail containing the requested information, if the period above one day is requested, it may take approximately up to one hour to be received.
DISPLACEMENT.DISPLACEMENT_NEW_DISCLAIMER: ATENTION: We are only reporting positions for the companies Auttran, Sitrack, Tfleet, LIFE e Sascar
DISPLACEMENT.FLIGHTS_NEW_DISCLAIMER: ATENTION: We are only reporting positions for Logipal
DISPLACEMENT.LICENSE_PLATE_FILTER_DISCLAIMER: Enter only letters and numbers. No special characters or spaces are allowed
DISPLACEMENT.NO_CONTENT: There's no events for this filter

EXPORTATION_DONE_MODAL.TITLE: Request completed!
EXPORTATION_DONE_MODAL.SUBTITLE: Badge access to fences has been updated.

FENCES.CHOOSE_A_SITE_WITH_VIRTUAL_FENCES: Choose a site with available fences to enable this checkbox
FENCES.ARE_YOU_SURE_TO_SET_DETECTORS_FENCE: By confirming the access changes, the total number of people inside the fence can be modified.
FENCES.ARE_YOU_SURE_TO_CANCEL_EDIT: By confirming the cancellation, you will lose any changes made to the accesses.
FENCES.NAME: Virtual Fence name
FENCES.MAX_OF: It is only permitted to create a new fence with at maximum of
FENCES.LAST_COORDINATE_WILL_CLOSE_AUTOMATICALLY: The last coordinate will be included automatically when finishing

INSTRUCTIONS_OVERLAY.TITLE: Please, respect this rules when creating a new virutal fence
INSTRUCTIONS_OVERLAY.TITLE_ERROR: This fence cannot be saved as it violates the stipulated rules.
INSTRUCTIONS_OVERLAY.DO_NOT_DRAW_IT_OUTSIDE: Do not draw outside a Vale site.
INSTRUCTIONS_OVERLAY.NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: A fence cannot be created with the same name as an existing fence on the site.

FENCES.SNACKBAR_MESSAGE: Please, you must plot at least 3 locations, and fill out all the required form fields highlighted in red.
FENCES.NO_DETECTORS_FOUND: There is no access control point for this fence
FENCES.DOES_NOT_EXIST: There are no registered accesses for this virtual fence
FENCES.DOES_NOT_ON_FENCE_EXIST: No accesses have been detected within the virtual fence area.
FENCES.GEOFENCE_CREATION_ALREADY_EXISTS: The name given for virtual fence already exists for this site
FENCES.GEOFENCE_DELETION_FAIL: An error occurred while trying to delete the geofencing
FENCES.GEOFENCE_DELETION_SUCCESS: The virtual fence was successfully deleted!
FENCES.GEOFENCE_DELETION_FORBIDDEN: User does not have permission to delete virtual fence
FENCES.CANT_CROSS_OTHER_FENCES: A fence can't cross other fences

PERIMETERS.CHOOSE_A_SITE_WITH_PERIMETERS: Choose a site with available perimeters to enable this checkbox
PERIMETERS.NAME: Perimeter name
PERIMETERS.DO_NOT_HAVE_INTERSECTIONS: The actual perimeter is not overlapping any other perimeter already created
PERIMETERS.HAVE_INTERSECTIONS: The actual perimeter is overlapping an existing perimeter
PERIMETERS.SURE_TO_DELETE: Are you sure to delete this official perimeter? This action is irreversible.

DEVICES.FETCHING_OLD: Fetching really old reports, it can take a while

HTTP_ERROR_RESPONSES.UNAUTHORIZED: This user doesn't have authorization to perform this action
HTTP_ERROR_RESPONSES.FORBIDEN: This user can't perform this action
HTTP_ERROR_RESPONSES.NOT_FOUND: No devices found for the provided filter
HTTP_ERROR_RESPONSES.SERVER_ERROR: Please select a site. If the error persists, contact application support.
HTTP_ERROR_RESPONSES.DEVICE_GROUP_NOT_FOUND: User is not associated with any device groups on this site. Please notify your focal point

DEVICES.INTERVAL_DISCLAIMER: Data on this screen considers location events received since October 3rd, 2022. Data is updated every 2 minutes. Facial recognition cameras are not displayed on this screen.
DEVICES.EXPORT_DONE_MESSAGE: You will receive an e-mail containing the requested information.
DEVICES.CONFIDENTIAL_DATA: These data are protected and confidential
DEVICES.AFTER_EXPORT_PROCESS: Once processed, your export will be automatically sent to the recipient below.
DEVICES.BATTERY_DISCLAIMER: The data on this screen considers location events received in the last 12 hours. Only devices with people associated are listed.

PANIC_BUTTON.NOT_APPLICABLE_TO_ALL_EVENTS: Not applicable to all listed events
PANIC_BUTTON.RAW_MESSAGE: It was not possible to decode the message automatically, but this is the message of the event
PANIC_BUTTON.ANSWER_CALL_CONFIRMATION: Will you really answer this call?
PANIC_BUTTON.ARE_YOU_SURE_TO_SET_AS_FALSE: Are you sure to finish the attendance as an FALSE panic alert
PANIC_BUTTON.ARE_YOU_SURE_TO_SET_AS_TRUE: Are you sure to finish the attendance as an TRUE panic alert
PANIC_BUTTON.ARE_YOU_SURE_TO_SET_NOT_APPLICABLE_ALL: You are about to confirm the status “Not Applicable” to all events.
PANIC_BUTTON.DATETIME_CLOSING_ATTENDANCE: Date and time of closing attendance
PANIC_BUTTON.COMMENT_EXCEEDED_MAX_LENGHT: Your comment must not exceed 500 characters.
PANIC_BUTTON.PLEASE_FILL_A_COMMENT: Please, fill in the comment of the attendance made
PANIC_BUTTON.PLEASE_FILL_A_COMMENT_FALSY_ALERT: Please state in the comment, why this false alert was generated
PANIC_BUTTON.SELECT_ATTENDANCE_TYPE: Please, select a type of attendance
PANIC_BUTTON.INSERT_HOUR_TOO: It is necessary to inform the hour too
PANIC_BUTTON.INSERT_CLOSING_FULL_DATE: You must fill in the date and hour fields to close this attendance.
PANIC_BUTTON.ACCESS_CONTROL_API_ERROR: Something went wrong in our server. Please, ignore this panic alert if it isn't inside your user's area.
PANIC_BUTTON.ALERT_ALREADY_BEEING_ATTENDED: This panic button alert is already being attended.

HTTP_ERRORS.FORBIDDEN: Access denied. Please, contact the administrator!
HTTP_ERRORS.BAD_REQUEST: It was not possible to complete the action. Try again later!
HTTP_ERRORS.SERVER_ERROR: Failed to process the action. Please, contact the administrator!

USER_AGREEMENT.READ_AND_AGREE_WITH_TERMS: I acknowledge that I have read, and accept the terms and conditions above
USER_AGREEMENT.READ_TERMS_AGAIN: To read the terms again access the Profile menu.

DISCLAIMERS.DEVICE_GROUP: A new device management model will be implanted. Groups that will restrict data visualization in portal will be created. Please contact your focal point to make sure you're part of the group you monitor.

ICONS.BUS_EVENT_ENTRANCE: Entrance to the site by bus
ICONS.BUS_EVENT_EXIT: Departure from the site by bus
